author: perezhilton
title: Stick It To Trump By Buying THESE 10 Things From Nordstrom For Under $50!
text:
Want to say "fuck you" to Donald Trump AND be stylish at the same time?? Here's how to do it!
As we reported , after Nordstrom dropped Ivanka Trump 's brand due to low sales, the President wrote a nasty message on Twitter SLAMMING the department store.
Related: Trump REALLY Wants You To Know He's Smart!
Considering how much we despise Drumpf and his horrific policies, we thought it would be a great idea to compile a list of cool things you can buy at Nordstrom, just to spite Donnie!
But don't worry! All of these gifts are under $50 so you can be woke and financially responsible at the same time!
Ch-ch-check out the goodies (below)!
What is it?
'London Chimney' insulated stainless steel water bottle from S'well
How much?
$25.00–$45.00 (depending on size)
BUY HERE!
